title: Apply uploaded logo across app (UI, favicon, OG image)

requirements.summary: Add the required generated logo/favicons/apple-touch-icon/OG image set as static assets with exact filenames and proper padding/centering.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames: kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png, kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png, kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png, kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png
All generated assets keep the logo proportions (no stretching) and appear visually centered with comfortable padding
Favicon assets are simplified/clear enough to be recognizable at 16x16 and 32x32

file_operations.description: Generate/replace the square transparent brand logo derived from "Tech Repair Logo with Blue and Gray.jpg", ensuring centered composition, preserved aspect ratio (no distortion), and comfortable padding for small-size legibility.
Generate/replace the 32x32 transparent favicon variant; simplify as needed so it remains recognizable at small sizes while staying centered with padding.
Generate/replace the 16x16 transparent favicon variant; simplify as needed so it remains recognizable at very small sizes while staying centered with padding.
Generate/replace the 180x180 apple touch icon variant; keep the logo centered with padding and preserve proportions.
Generate/replace the 1200x630 social preview image with a clean light background and the logo centered and prominent (no distortion).

requirements.summary: Wire the generated logo assets into the header, landing hero, and HTML head (favicon, apple-touch-icon, og:image), removing any legacy logo references.
acceptanceCriteria: Site header displays the new logo image without layout breakage on desktop and mobile
Landing page hero displays the new logo image without distortion
frontend/index.html contains link tags for 16x16 and 32x32 favicon and apple touch icon, and meta tags for og:image pointing to the generated assets
No other legacy logo assets remain referenced in the UI or HTML head

file_operations.description: Ensure the header logo uses frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png and add non-distorting rendering (e.g., use object-fit containment and stable sizing) so the image stays centered and does not stretch across breakpoints.

Ensure the landing page hero logo uses frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png and enforce non-distorting rendering (e.g., object-fit containment) so the logo remains crisp and centered on mobile/desktop.

Verify/update the HTML head to reference the generated static assets only: frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png; remove/replace any legacy icon/OG image references.
